sentence: It had some dubious spots on it and upon lifting the cushions I was grossed out my the stains
My biggest complaint though was being charged a nightly resort fee when I was not able to use any of the resort amenities

People making noise and running through the halls people in adjacent rooms with TVs way too loud no fault of the Hotel and they did take care of this and a company party held in their tent which had a DJ with very loud music
In the middle of nowhere should not have to pay additional fee per night when at other hotels the facilities are included in price
There is no laundry facility on site
We had to wait in the hotel lobby line on several occasions to get our adjoining rooms situated even though I asked well in advance costing valuable time
Will go to a moderately priced hotel with better amenities
Night stays were Way Over expensive when other resorts have better amenities and looks
The hotel does have a gorgeous pool area and the resort fee does include for kayak padleboard on property and sadly we had rain that kept us from using this amenity
Only problem was location of the room next to elevators kept me up until 2 am
The facility is nice the grounds are pleasant
Conference facilities and food also were excellent for the convention
Once you walk through the lobby area you discover an amazing hidden gem
Gym coffee shops restaurants
Nice range of facilities and close proximity to Mission Beach
The two restaurants serve good food and the bar near the swimming facilities stays open until 100 pm
We really loved the chilled fruit infused water offered in the lobby each day
friendly staff and great facilities had a blast especially with the swimming pool and hot tub a few more eateries would have been nice but still enjoyed our trip
The view was as portrayed on the website and apart from the lift noises the room was comfortable with the facilities convenient also
Friendly greeters throughout the lobby
